name: Lock-On
effect: Never Fail. The User's next attack has +2 Accuracy (this increase stacks with the standard +/-3 limit on Stat Changes). For the rest of the scene the User is able to target 'out of range' characters (from the moves ex:Fly, Dive, Dig).
description: The Pokemon's eyes zoom at a moving target to ensure that the next attack will be dealt with precision.
